com.cloudcraftgaming.perworldchatplus.data

Class WorldDataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudcraftgaming.perworldchatplus.data.WorldDataManager

  • public class WorldDataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Nova Fox on 6/5/2016. Website: www.cloudcraftgaming.com For Project: PerWorldChatPlus. This class contains everything regarding world specific data for chat.

    • Method Detail

      • createWorldDataFile

        public static void createWorldDataFile(java.lang.String worldName)
        Creates a default world data file for the specified world.
        Parameters:
        worldName - The world to create a data file for.

      • hasWorldData

        public static boolean hasWorldData(java.lang.String worldName)
        Checks if the specified world has a data file.
        Parameters:
        worldName - The world to check.
        Returns:
        True if the world has a data file, else false.

      • getWorldDataFile

        public static java.io.File getWorldDataFile(java.lang.String worldName)
        Gets the world data file for the specified world.
        Parameters:
        worldName - The world whose data file you wish to get.
        Returns:
        The world data file for the world.

      • getWorldDataYml

        public static org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration getWorldDataYml(java.lang.String worldName)
        Gets the world data yml for the specified world.
        Parameters:
        worldName - The world whose data yml you wish to get.
        Returns:
        The world data yml for the world.

      • saveWorldDataFile

        public static void saveWorldDataFile(org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration dataYml,
                     java.io.File dataFile)
        Saves the specified data files.
        Parameters:
        dataYml - The world data yml to save.
        dataFile - The world data file to save.

      • getAlias

        public static java.lang.String getAlias(java.lang.String worldName)
        Gets the world's alias if one exists.
        Parameters:
        worldName - The world you want the alias of.
        Returns:
        The world's alias, if one does not exist, returns the world's name.

      • setAlias

        public static void setAlias(java.lang.String worldName,
            java.lang.String newAlias)
        Sets the world's alias for chat messages
        Parameters:
        worldName - The world to set
        newAlias - The new alias (supports untranslated color codes).
